preConditions.sqlCheck: select count (*) from sys.all_lobs where owner=USER and table_name=${namecase}('T_RENTERAPICALL') and column_name=${namecase}('BIGDATA') and tablespace_name<>${namecase}('${tablespace_l}')

changeSet.sql: alter table T_RENTERAPICALL move lob (BIGDATA) store as (tablespace ${tablespace_l})

SELECT count(*) FROM sys.user_constraints where CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'P' and TABLE_NAME = 'T_RENTERAPICALL'

changeSet.sql: CREATE ALIAS IF NOT EXISTS BASE64_DECODE AS 'byte[] encode(String source) {return java.util.Base64.getDecoder().decode(source);}'

and.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS WHERE CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'PRIMARY KEY' and TABLE_NAME = 'T_ROOTDICTIONARY'
SELECT count(*) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS WHERE table_schema='${defaultSchemaName}' and CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'PRIMARY KEY' and TABLE_NAME = lower('T_ROOTDICTIONARY')
SELECT count(*) FROM sys.user_constraints where CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'P' and TABLE_NAME = 'T_ROOTDICTIONARY'
SELECT count(*) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.INDEXES WHERE TABLE_NAME='T_ROOTDICTIONARY' AND INDEX_NAME='I_ROOTDICTIONARY_TYPE'
SELECT count(*) from pg_indexes where schemaname='${defaultSchemaName}' and tablename=lower('T_ROOTDICTIONARY') and indexname=lower('I_ROOTDICTIONARY_TYPE')
SELECT count(*) from user_indexes where table_name=upper('T_ROOTDICTIONARY') and index_name=upper('I_ROOTDICTIONARY_TYPE')

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) from user_indexes where table_name=upper('T_ROOTDICTIONARY') and index_name=upper('I_ROOTDICTIONARY_TYPE')
